DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand role interleukin-6 physical activity patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Obesity group : BMI 3040 kg/m2 , fast plasma glucose < 6.4 mmol/l . Diabetes group : Type 2 diabetes accord American Diabetes Association criterion Exclusion criterion : Antidiabetic drug metformin Diabetes duration 5 year Inflammatory disease Current infection Liver disease ( transaminases > 2x upper normal range ) kidney disease ( creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl men 1.4 mg/dl woman ) pregnancy breastfeeding , woman child bear potential use acceptable form contraception immunosuppressive disease corticosteroid use regular nonsteroidal antinflammatory drug usage history carcinoma history tuberculosis anemia , bleed disorder obstructive pulmonary disease .
